ModuleDescription: The students are assigned an integrated design project involving various disciplines of civil engineering. The module provides the opportunity for students to work as a team on a civil engineering project integrating the knowledge they have gained from modules they have taken in earlier years. The module will also enhance their interpersonal, communication and leadership skills through group projects, report writing and a few oral presentations
Prerequisite: CE4 standing [Successful completion of relevant CE 2 and CE 3 modules which will be specified in the each project]
